snippet: Male coastal river otters in Alaska have a complex social life that centers on a common latrine, where they pick up information about their colleagues....
abstract: Social life of male river otters on coast of Alaska centers around shared bathroom area called latrine, where they not only socialize but pick up information from scat, urine and anal gland emissions.
lead_paragraph: Male coastal river otters in Alaska have a complex social life that centers on a common latrine, where they pick up information about their colleagues.

headline.print_headline: A Hot Spot for River Otters? The Latrine
headline.main: A River Otter’s Hot Spot? The Latrine
